text: The 2010 Summer Youth Olympic Games, officially known as the I Olympic Youth Summer Games, is an international summer sports event that was celebrated from August 14 to August 26, 2010 for youths. It was the first Youth Olympic Games(YOG) and the host city was Singapore. Olympics Category:Summer Youth Olympic Games Category:Events in Singapore Youth Olympics Category:2010s in Singapore
title: 2010 Summer Youth Olympics
